Interface IDeck

  • public interface IDeck
    Models a deck of size getSize(). You can shuffle it or draw the top card. Notice that getNbCard is the current number of cards.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCard​(int c)
      Add the given card to the deck.
      void drawCard()
      Draw the card on the top of the deck.
      int getNbCard()
      Gives the current card number in the deck.
      int getSizeDeck()
      Gives the size of the deck.
      void rmTopCard()
      Remove from the deck an occurence of the card named by m.
      void shuffleDeck()
      Shuffle the deck.
